items.text: What happens to me is my own doing.
Success is mostly a matter of luck.
I can pretty much determine what will happen in my life.
Many of the unhappy things in people's lives are partly due to bad luck.
When I make plans, I am almost certain that I can make them work.
Getting what I want has little or nothing to do with luck.
I am the master of my fate.
The world is run by a few people in power, and there is not much the little guy can do about it.
I can learn to do almost anything if I set my mind to it.
It is not always wise to plan too far ahead because many things turn out to be a matter of good or bad fortune.
My behavior is usually determined by my own conscious decisions.
I feel that I have little influence over the things that happen to me.
I am responsible for my own successes and failures.
Most people don't realize the extent to which their lives are controlled by accidental happenings.
I believe that I can control my own destiny.
There's no use in trying too hard since things will happen as they will anyway.
I can overcome most obstacles if I am determined enough.
I often feel that I have very little control over my life.
I am in control of my own emotions and actions.
Life is a game of chance.

L.high: You have a strong 'Internal Locus of Control.' You believe that you are responsible for your own success and have the power to shape your future.
L.low: You have an 'External Locus of Control.' You tend to believe that external factors, such as luck or fate, play a significant role in your life.
